directions: Cut potatoes in half and boil until cooked through but still firm. Plunge into ice water, drain well, and cube. Combine puffed rice, corn flakes, and cashew nuts in a baking dish and toast in a 300°F oven for 15 minutes, turning once. Chop onion and coriander leaves.
In a small bowl, mix together chutney, ketchup, lime juice, and cayenne/chili pepper. Combine all ingredients in a large bowl and toss lightly until mixed. Serve warm.
title: Bombay Bhel
